Text: Marketing Affiliate Data CollectionAND PRIVILEDGED ATTORNEY CLIENT WORK PRODUCT Yesterday we had a conference call with the pipeline transportation analysts to determine whether John Morris the economist who will conduct a market power study for INGAA had crafted a data request that would gather the right sort of information nececessary Columbia Enron and Koch did not have representatives on the call Im available this afternoon to give you all an update on what was discussed We decided to take a snap shot in time on firm pipeline transactions that occurred during the month of November John Morris will be sending out a revised data request through me that reflects some of the suggestions proposed by the group He is very open to tallking to your transportation folks directly to answer any questions you may have You have his telephone number from an earlier email

FW Template for pipeline dataMessage From John Morris mailto Sent Tuesday December AM To Joan Dreskin Claire Burum Janice Alperin Nancy Barton David Hendrickson Sally Turley Prince McDougal Janice Parker Norma Boddy Subject Template for pipeline data Privileged Confidential Prepared for Counsel Attached is a spreadsheet containing a template of the data for the INGAA study of affiliate prevelance on pipelines The spreadsheet is in Excel format Please get back to me if you need another format The spreadsheet has three tabs The first is for the pipeline capacity data an a conversion factor between Dthd and Mcfd The second is for data on the primary holders of capacity I have added a field for the DUNS number of the shipper and agent to assist in matching shippers across pipeline companies The third sheet contains the capacity release data I decided to separate out the capacity release data from the primary shipper data so that we can examine whether results are sensitive to different assumptions about capacity release If you have any questions or comments please give me a call at jrm INGAA Data Templatexls ATTtxt

Marketing affiliatesAND PRIVILEGED ATTORNEY WORK PRODUCT Original Message From mailto Sent Monday December PM To NGAAorg Subject M E M O R A N D U M To Joan Dreskin From Richard J Kruse Re Docket No PL Marketing Affiliate Rules Attached is Duke Energy Gas Transmissions draft of the sections which Duke agreed to prepare We look forward to discussing these with you in more detail Duke believes that it is critically important that the distinction be made between gas and electric industries since that seems to be a topic that is high on the FERC Staffs mind and you will see this reflected in our draft In addition we would echo the thoughts forwarded to you by Janice Alperin about the need to employ an expert As you can see many of the arguments in this draft need support from an economic expert Duke believes that INGAA should view of the utilization of experts on a longterm basis not just for comments to be filed on January or the presentation on January This is likely to be an ongoing dialogue and that there well may be opportunities for further presentations and for reply to anecdotal evidence presented by others Also we believe that the use of more than one policy expert would be appropriate In particular we feel it would be helpful to have an expert with a national reputation that could address the issues from a broad policy and economic prospective and we would like to discuss specific recommendations at our next meeting Duke will make available whatever internal resources are needed to help in developing the INGAA comments for filing on January and in the preparation of the presentation to be made on January However Duke believes that this is a longterm effort that ought not to be limited by the shortterm time deadline we currently face In some respects it may be preferable to wait and see what the allegations are from the other side and weigh in at that time We look forward to further discussions with you at your earliest convenience RJK Attachment See attached file DecINGAAPotentialAppdoc DecINGAAPotentialAppdoc

FW Locations for studyMessage From John Morris mailto Sent Wednesday December PM To Nancy Barton Claire Burum Janice Alperin David Hendrickson Janice Parker Sally Turley Norma Boddy Prince McDougal Cc Joan Dreskin Subject Locations for study Privileged Confidential Prepared for Counsel Attached is a spreadsheet containing the locations for which to capture data in the study I have tried specify locations that are meaningful in a market context and where the pipelines can determine who has capacity If you have any questions or believe that some change would be appropriate please feel free to give me a call or email Thanks jrm John R Morris Vice President Economists Incorporated New Hampshire Avenue NW Suite Washington DC Voice Fax This email and any attachments thereto is intended only for use by the addressees named herein and may contain legally privileged andor confidential information If you are not the intended recipient of this email you are hereby notified that any disseminationdistribution or copying of this email and any attachments thereto is strictly prohibited If you have received this email in error please immediately notify me at and permanently delete the original and any copy of any email and any printout thereof Locationsxls ATTtxt
